hero.description: Data Science and Data Engineering, with a technical vision and scalable focus. Committed to robust, long-term sustainable solutions and the intelligent automation of processes through orchestrated pipelines and integrable AI models.

about_section.subtitle: Data Science with a Technical Foundation and Systemic Focus
about_section.description_first_part: I built my foundation in data science through a combination of self-directed learning, university training, and hands-on projects. My journey into tech began during the pandemic, where I gained experience in development and database management, and soon shifted my focus to artificial intelligence, data analysis, and the automation of intelligent workflows.
about_section.description_second_part: Today, I specialize in data science and data engineering, working with tools like Python, SQL, Langchain, and orchestrated pipelines powered by models such as Gemini. My technical approach prioritizes scalability, clean architecture, and maintainable systems, with a focus on clarity, modularity, and efficient automation.

service_1.title: Data Science & Analysis
service_1.description: Extracting insights and building data-driven solutions through clean code, structured thinking, and real-world problem solving.

service_2.title: Data Engineering & Automation
service_2.description: Designing scalable pipelines, orchestrating workflows with Langchain, and integrating AI models like Gemini into efficient systems.

service_3.title: System Architecture
service_3.description: Creating robust, modular and maintainable systems with a clear separation of concerns and long-term scalability in mind.

project_section.description: Here are some of my recent projects. Each project was carefully crafted with attention to detail, performance, and user experience.

project_1.title: Google-Yelp
project_1.description: Google and Yelp tourism review integration system to enrich site analysis and user experiences in different cities. Includes visualization, ETL, and web deployment.

project_2.title: Video Game Recommender System
project_2.description: Intelligent game recommendation system based on real user interactions on Steam. Comprehensive analysis, predictive models, and functional application.

project_3.title: Siniestros Viales en CABA
project_3.description: In-depth exploratory data analysis of traffic accident data in the City of Buenos Aires, with interactive visualizations and reports in Power BI.

contact_section.description: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to discussing new opportunities.
